summary: The module implements classes that facilitate interaction with the Windows Registry and remote system services. It offers functions to parse registry data, navigate key hierarchies, and perform create, read, update, and delete operations on registry entries, as well as utilities to connect to the Service Control Manager, query and modify service status, enable remote registry access, and restore configurations over SMB/RPC connections.
business_intent: Provide security professionals and penetration testers with tools to enumerate, modify, and manipulate Windows registry settings and services on local or remote machines for assessment, exploitation, or remediation purposes.
